thumb.name: Wonderful Years Together
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Anniversary.%3Cbr%3EGretchen and Neil%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThinking of the two of you%3Cbr%3Eon this happy occasion%3Cbr%3Eand wishing you%3Cbr%3Emany more wonderful years together.%3Cbr%3ECongratulations

thumb.name: You Have Everything
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Anniversary%3Cbr%3Eto a couple%3Cbr%3Ewho has everything...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...happiness. love.%3Cbr%3Eand each other!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: True Love is a Gift
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECoverVerse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EGod Be with You.%3Cbr%3ECandice and Greg.%3Cbr%3Eon Your Anniversary%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ETrue love%3Cbr%3Eis a gift.%3Cbr%3Efrom the heart%3Cbr%3Eof God.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EGod be with you%3Cbr%3Eas you celebrate%3Cbr%3Ethis day so dear to you;%3Cbr%3E A day that's filled with memories%3Cbr%3Eof a love that's deep and true.%3Cbr%3EGod be with you%3Cbr%3Ethrough the years ahead.%3Cbr%3Eand may He always bless%3Cbr%3EYour lives with joy.%3Cbr%3Eyour hearts with love.%3Cbr%3Eyour world with happiness.

thumb.name: Rendevous
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EAn Anniversary Wish. Debbie and Glenn%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EWishing you a sweet celebration to share on your special day. and bunches of love and joy to share always. Happy Anniversary%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Anniversary on the Run
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Anniversary.%3Cbr%3EHoney!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EAnd you thought %3Cbr%3Ethe wedding day%3Cbr%3Ewas hectic. %3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ELove You!

thumb.name: Better and Better
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECoverVerse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFor You.%3Cbr%3EAndrea.%3Cbr%3Eon Our Anniversary%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EOur Love%3Cbr%3EGrows%3Cbr%3EMore Beautiful%3Cbr%3Ewith Time%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWhen I first fell in love with you.%3Cbr%3EI thought life was as good%3Cbr%3Eas it could get.%3Cbr%3EI loved you. you loved me.%3Cbr%3Eand nothing else in the world%3Cbr%3Eseemed to matter.%3Cbr%3EI never imagined%3Cbr%3Ehow much better%3Cbr%3EI'd come to know you.%3Cbr%3Ecare about you.%3Cbr%3Eand love you...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWhen I first fell in love with you.%3Cbr%3EI thought our love%3Cbr%3Ewas as good as it could get.%3Cbr%3EBut it just gets better%3Cbr%3Eall the time.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Anniversary%3Cbr%3Ewith All My Love

thumb.name: My Friend. My Love
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ECharlie.%3Cbr%3Emy anniversary gift%3Cbr%3Eto you%3Cbr%3Eis simply this --%3Cbr%3Eall my love%3Cbr%3Ewith all my heart.%3Cbr%3Eall for you...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...because today%3Cbr%3Eand forever.%3Cbr%3Eyou are my dear husband.%3Cbr%3Emy best friend.%3Cbr%3Eand my one and only love.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Good Times Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMark%3Cbr%3E%26%3Cbr%3ETina.%3Cbr%3EMay you%3Cbr%3Ealways%3Cbr%3Eremember%3Cbr%3Ethe good%3Cbr%3Etimes...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...and always make more%3Cbr%3Egood times to remember!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Anniversary
